name.baseName: Pulping ; Chemical mechanical pulp ; Timber (broadleaf) ; Chemical-mechanical pulp making (with alkali recovery) ; All sizes; NESPS2
制浆 ; 化学机械浆 ; 木材（阔叶木） ; 化机械法制浆（有碱回收） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment + floating separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94.75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment equipment (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment + floating separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94.75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment equipment (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该化学机械法制浆过程使用阔叶木和碱回收技术生产造纸用浆料。适用于各种规模的阔叶木，融入末端管理技术对废水进行处理，降低污染。这种技术对于致力于减少环境影响的操作至关重要，确保在排放之前有效地除去制浆过程中废水的化学需氧量(COD)污染物。末端处理技术包含化学混凝、好氧生物处理和多种二级处理方法，如氧化还原过程、额外化学混凝或浮选分离，每种方法在管理COD方面都有很高的技术效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码22,三级代码221.0,四级代码2211文件，在完整版文件中第481页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为化学机械浆，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment + redox process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.25，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+好氧生物处理法+氧化还原法，其效率为98.25，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment + chemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96.94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment equipment (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+好氧生物处理法+化学混凝法，其效率为96.94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment + floating separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94.75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment equipment (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+好氧生物处理法+上浮分离，其效率为94.75，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
